name: Check_spelling_and_grammar_in_a_different_language
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' group, click on the 'Spelling & Grammar' button.
A dialog box will appear. Click on the 'Set Language' button.
In the 'Language' dialog box, select the desired language from the list.
Click on the 'OK' button to apply the language settings.
Click on the 'Spelling & Grammar' button again to start checking the spelling and grammar in the selected language.
Review and correct any spelling or grammar errors as necessary.
Once you have finished checking, click on the 'Close' button to close the 'Spelling & Grammar' dialog box.
